account_login_boots_in_use.Description: if FALSE, oldest connection to account is not booted when new connection occurs

advanced_combat_pets.Description: (non-retail function) If enabled, Combat Pets can cast spells

advocate_fane_auto_bestow.Description: If enabled, Advocate Fane will automatically bestow new advocates to advocate_fane_auto_bestow_level

aetheria_heal_color.Description: If enabled, changes the aetheria healing over time messages from the default retail red color to green

allow_door_hold.Description: enables retail behavior where standing on a door while it is closing keeps the door as ethereal until it is free from collisions, effectively holding the door open for other players

allow_fast_chug.Description: enables retail behavior where a player can consume food and drink faster than normal by breaking animation

allow_jump_loot.Description: enables retail behavior where a player can quickly loot items while jumping, bypassing the 'crouch down' animation

allow_negative_dispel_resist.Description: enables retail behavior where #-# negative dispels can be resisted

allow_negative_rating_curve.Description: enables retail behavior where negative DRR from void dots didn't switch to the reverse rating formula, resulting in a possibly unintended curve that quickly ramps up as -rating goes down, eventually approaching infinity / divide by 0 for -100 rating. less than -100 rating would produce negative numbers.

allow_pkl_bump.Description: enables retail behavior where /pkl checks for entry collisions, bumping the player position over if standing on another PKLite. This effectively enables /pkl door skipping from retail

allow_summoning_killtask_multicredit.Description: enables retail behavior where a summoner can get multiple killtask credits from a monster

assess_creature_mod.Description: (non-retail function) If enabled, re-enables former skill formula, when assess creature skill is not trained or spec'ed

chat_echo_only.Description: global chat returns to sender only

chat_echo_reject.Description: global chat returns to sender on reject

chat_inform_reject.Description: global chat informs sender on reason for reject

chat_requires_account_15days.Description: global chat privileges requires accounts to be 15 days or older

chess_enabled.Description: if FALSE then chess will be disabled

client_movement_formula.Description: If enabled, server uses DoMotion/StopMotion self-client movement methods instead of apply_raw_movement

container_opener_name.Description: If enabled, when a player tries to open a container that is already in use by someone else, replaces 'someone else' in the message with the actual name of the player

corpse_decay_tick_logging.Description: If ENABLED then player corpse ticks will be logged

corpse_destroy_pyreals.Description: If FALSE then pyreals will not be completely destroyed on player death

craft_exact_msg.Description: If TRUE, and player has crafting chance of success dialog enabled, shows them an additional message in their chat window with exact %

creature_name_check.Description: if enabled, creature names in world database restricts player names during character creation

creatures_drop_createlist_wield.Description: If FALSE then Wielded items in CreateList will not drop. Retail defaulted to TRUE but there are currently data errors

equipmentsetid_enabled.Description: enable this to allow adding EquipmentSetIDs to loot armor

equipmentsetid_name_decoration.Description: enable this to add the EquipmentSet name to loot armor name

fastbuff.Description: If TRUE, enables the fast buffing trick from retail.

fellow_busy_no_recruit.Description: if FALSE, fellows can be recruited while they are busy, different from retail

fellow_kt_killer.Description: if FALSE, fellowship kill tasks will share with the fellowship, even if the killer doesn't have the quest

fellow_kt_landblock.Description: if TRUE, fellowship kill tasks will share with landblock range (192 distance radius, or entire dungeon)

fellow_quest_bonus.Description: if TRUE, applies EvenShare formula to fellowship quest reward XP (300% max bonus, defaults to false in retail)

gateway_ties_summonable.Description: if disabled, players cannot summon ties from gateways. defaults to enabled, as in retail

house_15day_account.Description: if disabled, houses can be purchased with accounts created less than 15 days old

house_30day_cooldown.Description: if disabled, houses can be purchased without waiting 30 days between each purchase

house_hook_limit.Description: if disabled, house hook limits are ignored

house_hookgroup_limit.Description: if disabled, house hook group limits are ignored

house_per_char.Description: if TRUE, allows 1 house per char instead of 1 house per account

house_purchase_requirements.Description: if disabled, requirements to purchase/rent house are not checked

house_rent_enabled.Description: If FALSE then rent is not required

iou_trades.Description: (non-retail function) If enabled, IOUs can be traded for objects that are missing in DB but added/restored later on

item_dispel.Description: if enabled, allows players to dispel items. defaults to end of retail, where item dispels could only target creatures

legacy_loot_system.Description: use the previous iteration of the ace lootgen system

lifestone_broadcast_death.Description: if true, player deaths are additionally broadcast to other players standing near the destination lifestone

loot_quality_mod.Description: if FALSE then the loot quality modifier of a Death Treasure profile does not affect loot generation

npc_hairstyle_fullrange.Description: if TRUE, allows generated creatures to use full range of hairstyles. Retail only allowed first nine (0-8) out of 51

offline_xp_passup_limit.Description: if FALSE, allows unlimited xp to passup to offline characters in allegiances

olthoi_play_enabled.Description: allows players to create and play as olthoi characters

override_encounter_spawn_rates.Description: if enabled, landblock encounter spawns are overidden by double properties below.

permit_corpse_all.Description: If TRUE, /permit grants permittees access to all corpses of the permitter. Defaults to FALSE as per retail, where /permit only grants access to 1 locked corpse

persist_movement.Description: If TRUE, persists autonomous movements such as turns and sidesteps through non-autonomous server actions. Retail didn't appear to do this, but some players may prefer this.

pet_stow_replace.Description: pet stowing for different pet devices becomes a stow and replace. defaults to retail value of false

player_config_command.Description: If enabled, players can use /config to change their settings via text commands

player_receive_immediate_save.Description: if enabled, when the player receives items from an NPC, they will be saved immediately

pk_server.Description: set this to TRUE for darktide servers

pk_server_safe_training_academy.Description: set this to TRUE to disable pk fighting in training academy and time to exit starter town safely

pkl_server.Description: set this to TRUE for pink servers

rares_real_time.Description: allow for second chance roll based on an rng seeded timestamp for a rare on rare eligible kills that do not generate a rare, rares_max_seconds_between defines maximum seconds before second chance kicks in

rares_real_time_v2.Description: chances for a rare to be generated on rare eligible kills are modified by the last time one was found per each player, rares_max_days_between defines maximum days before guaranteed rare generation

runrate_add_hooks.Description: if TRUE, adds some runrate hooks that were missing from retail (exhaustion done, raise skill/attribute

require_spell_comps.Description: if FALSE, spell components are no longer required to be in inventory to cast spells. defaults to enabled, as in retail

safe_spell_comps.Description: if TRUE, disables spell component burning for everyone

salvage_handle_overages.Description: in retail, if 2 salvage bags were combined beyond 100 structure, the overages would be lost

show_ammo_buff.Description: shows active enchantments such as blood drinker on equipped missile ammo during appraisal

show_aura_buff.Description: shows active aura enchantments on wielded items during appraisal

show_dat_warning.Description: if TRUE, will alert player (dat_warning_msg) when client attempts to download from server and boot them from game, disabled by default

show_dot_messages.Description: enabled, shows combat messages for DoT damage ticks. defaults to disabled, as in retail

show_first_login_gift.Description: if TRUE, will show on first login that the player earned bonus item (Blackmoor's Favor and/or Asheron's Benediction), disabled by default because msg is kind of odd on an emulator

show_mana_conv_bonus_0.Description: if disabled, only shows mana conversion bonus if not zero, during appraisal of casting items

smite_uses_takedamage.Description: if enabled, smite applies damage via TakeDamage

spellcast_recoil_queue.Description: if true, players can queue the next spell to cast during recoil animation

spell_projectile_ethereal.Description: broadcasts all spell projectiles as ethereal to clients only, and manually send stop velocity on collision. can fix various issues with client missing target id.

suicide_instant_death.Description: if enabled, @die command kills player instantly. defaults to disabled, as in retail

taboo_table.Description: if enabled, taboo table restricts player names during character creation

tailoring_intermediate_uieffects.Description: If true, tailoring intermediate icons retain the magical/elemental highlight of the original item

trajectory_alt_solver.Description: use the alternate trajectory solver for missiles and spell projectiles

universal_masteries.Description: if TRUE, matches end of retail masteries - players wielding almost any weapon get +5 DR, except if the weapon "seems tough to master". if FALSE, players start with mastery of 1 melee and 1 ranged weapon type based on heritage, and can later re-select these 2 masteries

use_generator_rotation_offset.Description: enables or disables using the generator's current rotation when offseting relative positions

use_turbine_chat.Description: enables or disables global chat channels (General, LFG, Roleplay, Trade, Olthoi, Society, Allegience)

use_wield_requirements.Description: disable this to bypass wield requirements. mostly for dev debugging

vendor_shop_uses_generator.Description: enables or disables vendors using generator system in addition to createlist to create artificial scarcity

world_closed.Description: enable this to startup world as a closed to players world

char_delete_time.Description: the amount of time in seconds a deleted character can be restored

chat_requires_account_time_seconds.Description: the amount of time in seconds an account is required to have existed for for global chat privileges

chat_requires_player_age.Description: the amount of time in seconds a player is required to have played for global chat privileges

chat_requires_player_level.Description: the level a player is required to have for global chat privileges

corpse_spam_limit.Description: the number of corpses a player is allowed to leave on a landblock at one time

default_subscription_level.Description: retail defaults to 1, 1 = standard subscription (same as 2 and 3), 4 grants ToD pre-order bonus item Asheron's Benediction

fellowship_even_share_level.Description: level when fellowship XP sharing is no longer restricted

mansion_min_rank.Description: overrides the default allegiance rank required to own a mansion

max_chars_per_account.Description: retail defaults to 11, client supports up to 20

pk_timer.Description: the number of seconds where a player cannot perform certain actions (ie. teleporting) after becoming involved in a PK battle

player_save_interval.Description: the number of seconds between automatic player saves

rares_max_days_between.Description: for rares_real_time_v2: the maximum number of days a player can go before a rare is generated on rare eligible creature kills

rares_max_seconds_between.Description: for rares_real_time: the maximum number of seconds a player can go before a second chance at a rare is allowed on rare eligible creature kills that did not generate a rare

summoning_killtask_multicredit_cap.Description: if allow_summoning_killtask_multicredit is enabled, the maximum # of killtask credits a player can receive from 1 kill

teleport_visibility_fix.Description: Fixes some possible issues with invisible players and mobs. 0 = default / disabled, 1 = players only, 2 = creatures, 3 = all world objects

windup_turn_retry_number.Description: Fixes turning forever during windup. 0 = default / disabled, 1 = retry one time, 2 = retry two times, ...

max_armor_durability.Description: the number of maximum durability points on loot generated armor

durability_damage.Description: the amount of durability points reduced per damage taken

pvp_damage_cap.Description: The cap for PvP damage per strike

cantrip_drop_rate.Description: Scales the chance for cantrips to drop in each tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail

minor_cantrip_drop_rate.Description: Scales the chance for minor cantrips to drop, relative to other cantrip levels in the tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail

major_cantrip_drop_rate.Description: Scales the chance for major cantrips to drop, relative to other cantrip levels in the tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail

epic_cantrip_drop_rate.Description: Scales the chance for epic cantrips to drop, relative to other cantrip levels in the tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail

legendary_cantrip_drop_rate.Description: Scales the chance for legendary cantrips to drop, relative to other cantrip levels in the tier. Defaults to 1.0, as per end of retail

advocate_fane_auto_bestow_level.Description: the level that advocates are automatically bestowed by Advocate Fane if advocate_fane_auto_bestow is true

aetheria_drop_rate.Description: Modifier for Aetheria drop rate, 1 being normal

chess_ai_start_time.Description: the number of seconds for the chess ai to start. defaults to -1 (disabled)

encounter_delay.Description: the number of seconds a generator profile for regions is delayed from returning to free slots

encounter_regen_interval.Description: the number of seconds a generator for regions at which spawns its next set of objects

equipmentsetid_drop_rate.Description: Modifier for EquipmentSetID drop rate, 1 being normal

fast_missile_modifier.Description: The speed multiplier applied to fast missiles. Defaults to retail value of 1.2

ignore_magic_armor_pvp_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of IgnoreMagicArmor (ie. hollow weapons) in pvp battles. 1.0 = full effectiveness / ignore all enchantments on armor (default), 0.5 = half effectiveness / use half enchantments from armor, 0.0 = no effectiveness / use full enchantments from armor

ignore_magic_resist_pvp_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of IgnoreMagicResist (ie. hollow weapons) in pvp battles. 1.0 = full effectiveness / ignore all resistances from life enchantments (default), 0.5 = half effectiveness / use half resistances from life enchantments, 0.0 = no effectiveness / use full resistances from life enchantments

luminance_modifier.Description: Scales the amount of luminance received by players

melee_max_angle.Description: for melee players, the maximum angle before a TurnTo is required. retail appeared to have required a TurnTo even for the smallest of angle offsets.

mob_awareness_range.Description: Scales the distance the monsters become alerted and aggro the players

pk_new_character_grace_period.Description: the number of seconds, in addition to pk_respite_timer, that a player killer is set to non-player killer status after first exiting training academy

pk_respite_timer.Description: the number of seconds that a player killer is set to non-player killer status after dying to another player killer

quest_mindelta_rate.Description: scales all quest min delta time between solves, 1 being normal

rare_drop_rate_percent.Description: Adjust the chance of a rare to spawn as a percentage. Default is 0.04, or 1 in 2,500. Max is 100, or every eligible drop.

spellcast_max_angle.Description: for advanced player spell casting, the maximum angle to target release a spell projectile. retail seemed to default to value of around 20, although some players seem to prefer a higher 45 degree angle

trophy_drop_rate.Description: Modifier for trophies dropped on creature death

unlocker_window.Description: The number of seconds a player unlocking a chest has exclusive access to first opening the chest.

vendor_unique_rot_time.Description: the number of seconds before unique items sold to vendors disappear

vitae_penalty.Description: the amount of vitae penalty a player gets per death

vitae_penalty_max.Description: the maximum vitae penalty a player can have

void_pvp_modifier.Description: Scales the amount of damage players take from Void Magic. Defaults to 0.5, as per retail. For earlier content where DRR isn't as readily available, this can be adjusted for balance.

xp_modifier.Description: scales the amount of xp received by players

imbue_crippling_blow_melee_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for melee attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc. ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0

imbue_crippling_blow_magic_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for magic attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc.  ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0

imbue_crippling_blow_missile_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Crippling Blow for missile attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = no effect. 2.0 = double damage on crit at max base skill. 4.0 = 4x damage etc.  ACE DEFAULT IS 6.0

imbue_critical_strike_magic_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Critical Strike Imbue for magic attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = default effect. 2.0 = Crit chance double of what the player normally would have with a CS weapon

imbue_critical_strike_melee_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Critical Strike Imbue for melee attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = default effect. 2.0 = Crit chance double of what the player normally would have with a CS weapon

imbue_critical_strike_missile_scalar.Description: Scales the effectiveness of Critical Strike Imbue for missile attacks at roughly max base skill. 1.0 = default effect. 2.0 = Crit chance double of what the player normally would have with a CS weapon

pvp_melee_weapon_damage_modifier.Description: Scales melee weapon damage for PvP

pvp_missile_weapon_damage_modifier.Description: Scales missile weapon damage for PvP

consumable_speed_modifier.Description: Scales consumable animation speed. Allows players to eat or drink at a faster rate if set to a higher number.

cloak_max_proc_rate.Description: Cap cloak proc chance to this percentage (100.0 will effectively use the standard ACE proc rate).

xbow_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that an xbow with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

bow_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a bow with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

thrown_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a thrown weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

heavy_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Heavy Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

light_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Light Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

finesse_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Finesse Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

twohanded_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Two-Handed Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

xbow_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Crossbow will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

bow_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Bow will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

thrown_cb_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Thrown Weapons will get when imbued with CB. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

heavy_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a heavy weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

light_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a light weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

finesse_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a finesse weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

twohanded_cb_crit_rate.Description: The amount that a twohanded weapon with Crippling Blow will land a critical strike. Default is 0.05(5%). A value of 1.00 would be 100% crit strike chance. be CAREFUL

heavy_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Heavy Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

light_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Light Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

finesse_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Finesse Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

twohanded_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Two-Handed Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

xbow_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Crossbow will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

bow_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Bow will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

thrown_cs_damage.Description: The extra crit rating Thrown Weapons will get when imbued with CS. For every 1.0 added to this number, this equals 100 crit rating.

heavy_weapons_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to heavy weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

light_weapons_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to light weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

finesse_weapons_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to finesse weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

twohanded_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to twohanded weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

xbow_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to xbow weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

bow_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to bow weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

thrown_damage.Description: The amount of flat damage added to thrown weapons per tink. Note for each damage event the added damage will be randomized between 1 and this value. Default is 0.

pvp_ar_melee_cap.Description: The cap on what proportion of armor can be reduced on melee AR. Should be between 0 and 1. Default is 0.6 for a 60% reduction in armor.

pvp_ar_missile_cap.Description: The cap on what proportion of armor can be reduced on missile AR. Should be between 0 and 1. Default is 0.6 for a 60% reduction in armor.

phantom_shield_damage_multi.Description: The damage multiplier done by phantom weapons vs shields. Default is 1.0x

phantom_damage_multi.Description: The damage multiplier done by phantom weapons vs armor. Default is 1.0x

content_folder.Description: for content creators to live edit weenies. defaults to Content folder found in same directory as ACE.Server.dll

dat_warning_msg.Item:
Your DAT files are incomplete.
ACEmulator does not support dynamic DAT updating at this time.
Please visit https://emulator.ac/how-to-play to download the complete DAT files.
dat_warning_msg.Description: Warning message displayed (if show_dat_warning is true) to player if client attempts DAT download from server

popup_header.Description: Welcome message displayed when you log in

popup_welcome.Item: To begin your training, speak to the Society Greeter. Walk up to the Society Greeter using the 'W' key, then double-click on her to initiate a conversation.
popup_welcome.Description: Welcome message popup in training halls

popup_welcome_olthoi.Item: Welcome to the Olthoi hive! Be sure to talk to the Olthoi Queen to receive the Olthoi protections granted by the energies of the hive.
popup_welcome_olthoi.Description: Welcome message displayed on the first login for an Olthoi Player
